title: Bug 269522 - Cross Reference View and Markers Mix Up Joinpoints Assigned to Advice
description: This bug report addresses a problem related to the Cross Reference view and markers mixing up joinpoints assigned to advice.
OB:
The observed behavior includes the following issues:
1. When selecting line 22, you can observe 5 joinpoints, but there should only be 3.
2. When selecting line 68, you see zero joinpoints, even though there should be 2.
3. Right-clicking the marker at line 68 and choosing 'advises' reveals all 5 joinpoints instead of the expected 2.
EB:
The expected behavior should be as follows:
1. When selecting line 22, you should see only 3 joinpoints, not 5.
2. When selecting line 68, it should display 2 joinpoints, not zero.
3. Right-clicking the marker at line 68 and choosing 'advises' should reveal only the 2 relevant joinpoints, not all 5.
SR:
To reproduce this issue, follow these steps:
1. Open and perform a clean compile on the attached project.
2. Open the Cross Reference view.
3. Select line 22 and note that it shows 5 joinpoints instead of the expected 3.
4. Select line 68 and observe that it displays zero joinpoints instead of the expected 2.
5. Right-click the marker at line 68 and choose 'advises' to see all 5 joinpoints instead of only 2.
